title: Save Over $60 on This Excellent Gaming Mouse and Keyboard Bundle From Logitech
text: Logitech G413 SE and Logitech G502 Hero Bundle Save now over $60 on a gaming mouse and keyboard bundle from the leading peripheral manufacturer Logitech. This bundle comes with a legendary G502 Hero gaming mouse and a full-sized G413 SE mechanical keyboard, perfect for most types of gaming. PC gamers seeking better peripherals can now find the [Logitech G413 SE and G502 Hero bundle](https://www.amazon.com/Logitech-Full-Size-Mechanical-Programmable-Anti-Ghosting/dp/B0BBFWTD7T?tag=gamerant0f-20&ascsubtag=UUgrUeUpU2206333&asc_refurl=https%3A%2F%2Fgamerant.com%2Fsave-over-60-on-this-excellent-gaming-mouse-and-keyboard-bundle-from-logitech%2F&asc_campaign=Affiliate) currently available on Amazon for an excellent combined price of $97.99. This under $100 price tag for two amazing pieces of gaming equipment is one of the best bundle deals currently, delivering a 38% discount from the normal price of $159.98. This deal saves exactly $61.99, offering a solid opportunity to get both a mechanical keyboard and a versatile, feature-rich gaming mouse at a lower price. Both devices are made by Logitech, a leading name in gaming peripherals. The company is among the largest and most reputable companies in the space with an immensely large catalog of products, designed for everything from beginners to [competitive professionals](https://gamerant.com/logitech-g-pro-x-superlight-wireless-mouse-review/). The G series has become almost synonymous with quality gaming products, endorsed by many of the most accomplished teams and celebrated gamers and streamers. Why the Logitech G413 SE and G502 Hero Bundle Is Great for All Gamers This bundle from Logitech comes with the G413 SE gaming keyboard and G502 Hero gaming mouse, both excellent peripherals in their own right. The former is [a mechanical keyboard](https://gamerant.com/best-mechanical-gaming-keyboards/), featuring tactile switches that offer reliable accuracy with a satisfying feel. The black-brushed aluminum top plate not only provides a sleek, premium finish but also reinforces the keyboard's structure, ensuring it can withstand the rigors of intense gaming. On the mouse side, the [Logitech G502 Hero is engineered for precision](https://gamerant.com/logitech-g502-hero-gaming-mouse-review/) and customization. This mouse comes with an iconic, ergonomic design that gamers have fallen in love with for years. However, the Hero 25K sensor is what brings the mouse alive with super-accurate 1:1 tracking with a DPI range from 100 to 25,600. The mouse even includes an adjustable weight system, enabling players to fine-tune the balance by adding or removing up to five weights. To make it even more versatile, it has 11 programmable buttons that let players assign commands or macros. Thanks to the ergonomic shape, excellent customization options, and top-tier precision, the G502 Hero is an excellent choice for a variety of games from MOBAs to FPS. Another feature of the bundle is the programmable RGB lighting available on the mouse and the subtle white LED backlighting on the keyboard. All this is now over $60 cheaper than normal. Get the [Logitech G413 SE and G502 Hero bundle](https://www.amazon.com/Logitech-Full-Size-Mechanical-Programmable-Anti-Ghosting/dp/B0BBFWTD7T?tag=gamerant0f-20&ascsubtag=UUgrUeUpU2206333&asc_refurl=https%3A%2F%2Fgamerant.com%2Fsave-over-60-on-this-excellent-gaming-mouse-and-keyboard-bundle-from-logitech%2F&asc_campaign=Affiliate) now on Amazon for just $97.99. Key Features - Durable and fast mechanical switches in the Logitech G413 SE - Precise Hero 25K sensor in the Logitech G502 Hero - Adjustable RGB lighting and great customization options
